GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1992 to provide a University responsive to the needs, culture and values of Namibia through highest quality education and research for students who may benefit from them, regardless of race, colour, gender, ethnic origin, religion, creed, social and economic status or physical condition.
AdmissionRequirements: International General Certificate of Secondary Education, with 5 subjects passed normally in not more than 3 examination sittings, and with a minimum of 25 points on the UNAM evaluation scale
English IGCSE (English as First, or Second, Language) compulsory
